examples.code: imageEditor.addIcon('arrow'); // The position is center on canvas
imageEditor.addIcon('arrow', { left: 100, top: 100 }).then(objectProps => { console.log(objectProps.id); });
imageEditor.addImageObject('path/fileName.jpg').then(objectProps => { console.log(ojectProps.id); });

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: rx
properties.description: Radius x value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: ry
properties.description: Radius y value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: isRegular
properties.description: Whether resizing shape has 1:1 ratio or not

examples.code: imageEditor.addShape('rect', { fill: 'red', stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, width: 100, height: 200, left: 10, top: 10, isRegular: true });
imageEditor.addShape('circle', { fill: 'red', stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, rx: 10, ry: 100, isRegular: false }).then(objectProps => { console.log(objectProps.id); });

imageEditor.addShape('rect', { fill: { type: 'filter', filter: [{blur: 0.3}, {pixelate: 20}] }, stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, rx: 10, ry: 100, isRegular: false }).then(objectProps => { console.log(objectProps.id); });

items.name: addText
items.description: The event when 'TEXT' drawing mode is enabled and click non-object area.

examples.code: imageEditor.on('addText', function(pos) { console.log('text position on canvas: ' + pos.originPosition); console.log('text position on brwoser: ' + pos.clientPosition); });

properties.name: fontWeight
properties.description: Type of thicker or thinner looking (normal / bold)

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Type of text align (left / center / right)

examples.code: imageEditor.addText('init text');
imageEditor.addText('init text', { styles: { fill: '#000', fontSize: 20, fontWeight: 'bold' }, position: { x: 10, y: 10 } }).then(objectProps => { console.log(objectProps.id); });
imageEditor.applyFilter('Grayscale');
imageEditor.applyFilter('mask', {maskObjId: id}).then(obj => { console.log('filterType: ', obj.type); console.log('actType: ', obj.action); }).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });;
imageEditor.changeCursor('crosshair');
imageEditor.changeIconColor(id, '#000000');
imageEditor.changeSelectableAll(false); // or true

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: rx
properties.description: Radius x value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: ry
properties.description: Radius y value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: isRegular
properties.description: Whether resizing shape has 1:1 ratio or not

examples.code: // call after selecting shape object on canvas imageEditor.changeShape(id, { // change rectagle or triangle fill: 'red', stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, width: 100, height: 200 });
// call after selecting shape object on canvas imageEditor.changeShape(id, { // change circle fill: 'red', stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, rx: 10, ry: 100 });

items.name: changeText(id, text)
items.description: Change contents of selected text object on image

examples.code: imageEditor.changeText(id, 'change text');

properties.name: fontWeight
properties.description: Type of thicker or thinner looking (normal / bold)

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Type of text align (left / center / right)

examples.code: imageEditor.changeTextStyle(id, { fontStyle: 'italic' });
imageEditor.clearObjects();
imageEditor.clearRedoStack();
imageEditor.clearUndoStack();
imageEditor.crop(imageEditor.getCropzoneRect());
imageEditor.deactivateAll();
imageEditor.discardSelection();

imageEditor.flipX().then((status => { console.log('flipX: ', status.flipX); console.log('flipY: ', status.flipY); console.log('angle: ', status.angle); }).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });

imageEditor.flipY().then(status => { console.log('flipX: ', status.flipX); console.log('flipY: ', status.flipY); console.log('angle: ', status.angle); }).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });
var canvasSize = imageEditor.getCanvasSize(); console.log(canvasSize.width); console.height(canvasSize.height);

returns.description: {{left: number, top: number, width: number, height: number}} rect

examples.code: // Image editor drawing mode // // NORMAL: 'NORMAL' // CROPPER: 'CROPPER' // FREE_DRAWING: 'FREE_DRAWING' // LINE_DRAWING: 'LINE_DRAWING' // TEXT: 'TEXT' // if (imageEditor.getDrawingMode() === 'FREE_DRAWING') { imageEditor.stopDrawingMode(); }
console.log(imageEditor.getImageName());

items.name: getObjectPosition(id, originX, originY)
items.description: Get object position by originX, originY

examples.code: var position = imageEditor.getObjectPosition(id, 'left', 'top'); console.log(position);

returns.description: {{x:number, y: number}} position by origin if id is valid, or null

items.name: getObjectProperties(id, keys)
items.description: Get properties of active object corresponding key

examples.code: var props = imageEditor.getObjectProperties(id, 'left'); console.log(props);
var props = imageEditor.getObjectProperties(id, ['left', 'top', 'width', 'height']); console.log(props);
var props = imageEditor.getObjectProperties(id, { left: null, top: null, width: null, height: null, opacity: null }); console.log(props);

returns.description: properties if id is valid or null

items.name: hasFilter(type)
items.description: Whether it has the filter or not

returns.description: true if it has the filter

items.name: isEmptyRedoStack()
items.description: Whehter the redo stack is empty or not

items.name: isEmptyUndoStack()
items.description: Whehter the undo stack is empty or not

examples.code: imageEditor.loadImageFromFile(file).then(result => { console.log('old : ' + result.oldWidth + ', ' + result.oldHeight); console.log('new : ' + result.newWidth + ', ' + result.newHeight); });

imageEditor.loadImageFromURL('http://url/testImage.png', 'lena').then(result => { console.log('old : ' + result.oldWidth + ', ' + result.oldHeight); console.log('new : ' + result.newWidth + ', ' + result.newHeight); });

items.name: mousedown
items.description: The mouse down event with position x, y on canvas

examples.code: imageEditor.on('mousedown', function(event, originPointer) { console.log(event); console.log(originPointer); if (imageEditor.hasFilter('colorFilter')) { imageEditor.applyFilter('colorFilter', { x: parseInt(originPointer.x, 10), y: parseInt(originPointer.y, 10) }); } });

params.name: options
params.description: Canvas max width & height of css

properties.name: menu
properties.description: It can be selected when only specific menu is used, Default values are ['crop', 'flip', 'rotate', 'draw', 'shape', 'icon', 'text', 'mask', 'filter'].

properties.name: initMenu
properties.description: The first menu to be selected and started.

properties.name: usageStatistics
properties.description: Let us know the hostname. If you don't want to send the hostname, please set to false.

examples.code: var ImageEditor = require('tui-image-editor'); var blackTheme = require('./js/theme/black-theme.js'); var instance = new ImageEditor(document.querySelector('#tui-image-editor'), { includeUI: { loadImage: { path: 'img/sampleImage.jpg', name: 'SampleImage' }, theme: blackTheme, // or whiteTheme menu: ['shape', 'filter'], initMenu: 'filter', uiSize: { width: '1000px', height: '700px' }, menuBarPosition: 'bottom' }, cssMaxWidth: 700, cssMaxHeight: 500, selectionStyle: { cornerSize: 20, rotatingPointOffset: 70 } });

items.name: objectActivated
items.description: The event when object is selected(aka activated).

examples.code: imageEditor.on('objectActivated', function(props) { console.log(props); console.log(props.type); console.log(props.id); });
imageEditor.on('objectAdded', function(props) { console.log(props); });

items.name: objectMoved
items.description: The event when object is moved

examples.code: imageEditor.on('objectMoved', function(props) { console.log(props); console.log(props.type); });

items.name: objectRotated
items.description: The event when object angle is changed

examples.code: imageEditor.on('objectRotated', function(props) { console.log(props); console.log(props.type); });

items.name: objectScaled
items.description: The event when scale factor is changed

examples.code: imageEditor.on('objectScaled', function(props) { console.log(props); console.log(props.type); });
imageEditor.redo();
imageEditor.on('redoStackChanged', function(length) { console.log(length); });
imageEditor.registerIcons({ customIcon: 'M 0 0 L 20 20 L 10 10 Z', customArrow: 'M 60 0 L 120 60 H 90 L 75 45 V 180 H 45 V 45 L 30 60 H 0 Z' });
imageEditor.removeFilter('Grayscale').then(obj => { console.log('filterType: ', obj.type); console.log('actType: ', obj.action); }).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });

items.name: removeObject(id)
items.description: Remove an object or group by id

examples.code: imageEditor.removeObject(id);

imageEditor.resetFlip().then(status => { console.log('flipX: ', status.flipX); console.log('flipY: ', status.flipY); console.log('angle: ', status.angle); }).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });;

items.name: resetZoom()
items.description: Reset zoom. Change zoom level to 1.0

examples.code: imageEditor.rotate(10); // angle = 10 imageEditor.rotate(10); // angle = 20 imageEditor.rotate(5); // angle = 5 imageEditor.rotate(-95); // angle = -90 imageEditor.rotate(10).then(status => { console.log('angle: ', status.angle); })).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });

imageEditor.setAngle(10); // angle = 10 imageEditor.rotate(10); // angle = 20 imageEditor.setAngle(5); // angle = 5 imageEditor.rotate(50); // angle = 55 imageEditor.setAngle(-40); // angle = -40 imageEditor.setAngle(10).then(status => { console.log('angle: ', status.angle); })).catch(message => { console.log('error: ', message); });
imageEditor.startDrawingMode('FREE_DRAWING'); imageEditor.setBrush({ width: 12, color: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)' }); imageEditor.setBrush({ width: 8, color: 'FFFFFF' });

items.name: setDrawingShape(type, options)
items.description: Set states of current drawing shape

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height value (When type option is 'rect', this options can use)

properties.name: rx
properties.description: Radius x value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: ry
properties.description: Radius y value (When type option is 'circle', this options can use)

properties.name: isRegular
properties.description: Whether resizing shape has 1:1 ratio or not

examples.code: imageEditor.setDrawingShape('rect', { fill: 'red', width: 100, height: 200 });
imageEditor.setDrawingShape('rect', { fill: { type: 'filter', filter: [{blur: 0.3}, {pixelate: 20}] }, width: 100, height: 200 });
imageEditor.setDrawingShape('circle', { fill: 'transparent', stroke: 'blue', strokeWidth: 3, rx: 10, ry: 100 });
imageEditor.setDrawingShape('triangle', { // When resizing, the shape keep the 1:1 ratio width: 1, height: 1, isRegular: true });
imageEditor.setDrawingShape('circle', { // When resizing, the shape keep the 1:1 ratio rx: 10, ry: 10, isRegular: true });

items.name: setObjectPosition(id, posInfo)
items.description: Set object position  by originX, originY

examples.code: // align the object to 'left', 'top' imageEditor.setObjectPosition(id, { x: 0, y: 0, originX: 'left', originY: 'top' });
// align the object to 'right', 'top' var canvasSize = imageEditor.getCanvasSize(); imageEditor.setObjectPosition(id, { x: canvasSize.width, y: 0, originX: 'right', originY: 'top' });
// align the object to 'left', 'bottom' var canvasSize = imageEditor.getCanvasSize(); imageEditor.setObjectPosition(id, { x: 0, y: canvasSize.height, originX: 'left', originY: 'bottom' });

// align the object to 'right', 'bottom' var canvasSize = imageEditor.getCanvasSize(); imageEditor.setObjectPosition(id, { x: canvasSize.width, y: canvasSize.height, originX: 'right', originY: 'bottom' });
imageEditor.setObjectProperties(id, { left:100, top:100, width: 200, height: 200, opacity: 0.5 });

items.name: setObjectPropertiesQuietly(id, keyValue)
items.description: Set properties of active object, Do not leave an invoke history.

examples.code: imageEditor.setObjectPropertiesQuietly(id, { left:100, top:100, width: 200, height: 200, opacity: 0.5 });

items.name: startDrawingMode(mode, option)
items.description: Start a drawing mode. If the current mode is not 'NORMAL', 'stopDrawingMode()' will be called first.

params.name: option
params.description: parameters of drawing mode, it's available with 'FREE_DRAWING', 'LINE_DRAWING'

examples.code: imageEditor.startDrawingMode('FREE_DRAWING', { width: 10, color: 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)' }); imageEditor.startDrawingMode('LINE_DRAWING', { width: 10, color: 'rgba(255,0,0,0.5)', arrowType: { tail: 'chevron' // triangle } });

items.name: stopDrawingMode()
items.description: Stop the current drawing mode and back to the 'NORMAL' mode

examples.code: imageEditor.stopDrawingMode();

items.name: textEditing
items.description: The event which starts to edit text object

examples.code: imageEditor.on('textEditing', function() { console.log('text editing'); });

properties.name: format
properties.description: The format of the output image. Either "jpeg" or "png"

properties.name: quality
properties.description: Quality level (0..1). Only used for jpeg.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Cropping left offset. Introduced in fabric v1.2.14

properties.name: top
properties.description: Cropping top offset. Introduced in fabric v1.2.14

properties.name: width
properties.description: Cropping width. Introduced in fabric v1.2.14

properties.name: height
properties.description: Cropping height. Introduced in fabric v1.2.14

examples.code: imgEl.src = imageEditor.toDataURL(); imageEditor.loadImageFromURL(imageEditor.toDataURL(), 'FilterImage').then(() => { imageEditor.addImageObject(imgUrl); });

returns.description: A DOMString containing the requested data URI

examples.code: imageEditor.undo();
imageEditor.on('undoStackChanged', function(length) { console.log(length); });

params.name: x
params.description: x axis of center point for zoom

params.name: y
params.description: y axis of center point for zoom
